title: A Modern Comedy - Soames "thoroughly at home"

content.question: In the context of the passage as a whole, the description of Soames as feeling “thoroughly at home” in front of the statue is

choices.label: ironic, since Soames has been traveling for a long time and looks forward to returning home
paradoxical, since Soames feels somewhat disoriented when he looks at the statue
surprising, since Soames typically does not find art affecting
exaggerated, since Soames quickly loses interest in the statue

content.answer: ironic, since Soames has been traveling for a long time and looks forward to returning home

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
